name: Fourier
description:
Using complex Fourier series to trace any 2D shape.

Note: run this on full screen for an immersive experience.

Controls:

  • P - Toggle menu.
  • O - Toggle preloaded shapes menu.
  • B - Open brush.
  • C - Clear brush.

Check out the source code.
